```{r, echo=FALSE}
if (!(is.null(theme))) {
df <- plotSPA(om=index, which="omAllocation", theme=theme[i], dataframe = TRUE)
plotSPA(index, which="omAllocation", theme=unique(index$theme), item=names(df)[j])
} else if (!(is.null(functionalGroup))) {
  df <- plotSPA(om=index, which="omAllocation", functionalGroup=functionalGroup[i], dataframe = TRUE)
plotSPA(index, which="omAllocation", functionalGroup=unique(index$functional_group), item=names(df)[j])
}
```
